channel.title: coffee on A Developer's Note
channel.description: Recent content in coffee on A Developer's Note

item.title: My Home Brewing Kit an Expensive Hobby
item.description: So, coffee has been an exciting (and expensive) part of my life, it has been a year since I’m into this brewing field, and I guess it is my time to show what I have learnt throughout this year.

item.title: Cara Membuat Filtered Iced Coffee (Japanese Brew)
item.description: Bayangkan di hari yang panas terik, kerjaan banyak, suntuk, haus juga.
